com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Class KLightSpherePseudoWithShadowVariance

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.kernel.types.KLightSpherePseudoWithShadowVariance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KLightPropertiesType, KLightSpherePropertiesType, KLightSpherePseudoType

    @EqualityReference
public final class KLightSpherePseudoWithShadowVariance
extends Object
implements KLightSpherePseudoType

    A shadow-projecting pseudo-spherical light emulated with six projective lights.
